description:
Chakuro`s peaceful life on the Mud Whale is interrupted by the appearance of another island. When they investigate, he finds a girl living there.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: It Was All in Our Precious World
Ta wyspa była całym naszym światem
Watashitachi no Daiji na Sekai no Subete Datta
私たちの大事な世界の全てだった
